document.full_text: faltering economic growth and edginess about the impact of costly oil fueled a fourth day of aggressive selling across commodities as brent crude headed to its biggest weekly fall in a year while silver extended an historic slide.
document.title: commodities dive on jitters about economy, demand
lines_and_colors: faltering economic growth and edginess about the impact of costly oil fueled a fourth day of aggressive selling across commodities as brent crude headed to its biggest weekly fall in a year while silver extended an historic slide.
